attributes.action: People Claiming Benifits Should do Comunity Service
attributes.additional_details:
I want to allow people who are on benefits and who are not benefiting there own cause and the country's cause by getting them to perform simple Community Service jobs like clean up the streets or paint over graffiti or even help out in a community centre and should be able to do at least 2 hours a day community service to bennifit the local comunitys when they are getting paid to do nothing anyway !

only exception to this should be people on disability even then there is a job in a community centre which they could carry out such as typing things up or taking a register,

bottom line is we need to find jobs for these people to do whilst they are on bennifits, this will also bennifit them by getting them back into a work routine and giving them some sort of work ethics for the younger people who havt yet had a job
